title: Employee Registration Form with CRUD operation
description: Designed and implemented an interactive Employee Details Form for efficient data storage, retrieval, updation and deletion.

title: YouTube Clone
description: Created a simplified version of the YouTube platform. Emphasized responsive design principles for an optimal viewing experience on various screen sizes and replicating core functionalities of the original platform.

title: Rock Paper Scissors
description: Designed and developed an engaging Rock Paper Scissors game. Ensured accuracy in game logic implementation, providing an enjoyable and interactive experience for users.
